title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
created_time: February 23, 2023, 07:29:00 PMLast edit: March 07, 2025, 05:50:26 PM by bitbollo
content: Fellows bitcoiners and collectors, I want sell these two editions of...Derrière le miroir with Original Lithographies of A. Giacomettihttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vRsejf8xdC0In perfect conditions, originalAlberto Giacometti - Derrière le miroir N°98 - 1957single edition price = 300 euro (please use preev.com for btc conversion)QuoteIn-folio (380 x 280 mm) en feuilles, 28 pages.3 ORIGINAL LITHOGRAPHS IN BLACK including 1 in double page in first edition.First edition of this issue of DLM published in June 1957 for the exhibition of ALBERTO GIACOMETTI at the Galerie Maeght.Text by Jean Genet "L'Atelier d'Alberto Giacometti".Alberto Giacometti - Derrière le miroir N°127 - 1961single edition price = 250 euro (please use preev.com for btc conversion)QuoteDerriere Le Miroir 127, published in May 1961 Please note this is the First edition on Canson paper rather than the common reprint on smooth paper. Devoted to the exhibition of paintings and sculptures by Alberto Giacometti at the Galerie Maeght. 14 original lithographs including 3 in double page. Text by Olivier Larronde, Léna Leclercq and Isaku Yanaihara The famous FIRST issue from 127 is a difficult and rare one to find in top condition. price both editions (discounted) = 450 euro (please use preev.com for btc conversion)Shipment with insured/tracked postage to be counted (payed by buyer) according location.Feel free to reply here or send a DM.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: BUMP! Price decreased if buy both edition! Feel free to drop a reasonable offer if interested!

comments.body: opportunity to own original "Giacometti" works! BUMP! Still available!I don't want to sell individual lithographs but the entire collection/full editions!Below is an example of the price at which they are sold... (100/200 USD for each litho...)https://www.1stdibs.com/it/creators/alberto-giacometti/art/?modal=intlWelcomeModal
